message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for $14000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $13000 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $13000. I'm thinking $11500 would be a more comfortable price for me. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can see you really want the product, so I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll meet you at $12500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $12500. I'm thinking $11000 would be a more reasonable price for me. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I can see you're really pushing the boundaries, Bob! I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $12000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me halfway.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not quite there. I'm thinking $10500 would be a more comfortable price for me. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.

I've already made a final offer, Bob, but I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll meet you at $11000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your last concession, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm thinking $9800 would be a more comfortable price for me. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
